description.value: Your flare wraps around your foes on impact, entangling them. Make a solar flare Strike. On a hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Immobilized] until the end of its next turn or until it Escapes (against your class DC), whichever comes first. On a critical hit, the target is additionally @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Off-Guard] for as long as it's immobilized.
